channel.title: Blog on instance.id
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on instance.id

item.title: Searcher
item.description: JSONI am currently working on an RPG. I have not come up with a name for my game yet, let alone a story line. A lot of it is still subject to change as well. So if you see anything you feel you want to comment on or recommend, please do. I do know for sure I am going to implement co-op, maybe like 3-4 people to quest together and also 3v3 or 5v5 PVP, possibly a team deathmatch or objective style setup.

item.title: Searcher
